.flood-warning-container .fw-link-container a:link{text-decoration:underline}.flood-warning-container .fw-link-container a:active,.flood-warning-container .fw-link-container a:focus{color:#000;text-decoration:none;background-color:#b9dc0c;box-shadow:0 4px 0 0 currentColor;outline:none}.flood-warning-container{border:1px solid rgba(42,42,42,.16);margin-bottom:24px;white-space:nowrap}.flood-warning-container .flood-warning-container-inner{padding:25px 22px;border-left:8px solid #0673fa}@media only screen and (min-width: 960px){.flood-warning-container .flood-warning-container-inner{padding-bottom:30px;display:flex}}.flood-warning-container .fw-header{vertical-align:top;white-space:normal}@media only screen and (min-width: 960px){.flood-warning-container .fw-header{display:inline-block;width:280px}.flood-warning-container .fw-header .fw-footer{display:block;margin-top:16px}}@media only screen and (min-width: 1280px){.flood-warning-container .fw-header{width:310px}}.flood-warning-container .fw-footer{display:block;margin-top:16px;font-size:14px;line-height:20px;color:#2a2a2a;white-space:normal}.flood-warning-container .fw-detail{vertical-align:top;border-top:1px solid #ccc;padding-top:25px;margin-top:25px;white-space:normal;line-height:5px;overflow-wrap:break-word;hyphens:auto}@media only screen and (min-width: 960px){.flood-warning-container .fw-detail{border-top:none;margin-top:5px;padding-top:20px;display:inline-block;border-left:1px solid #ccc;padding-left:25px;min-height:104px}}@media only screen and (min-width: 1280px){.flood-warning-container .fw-detail{width:calc(100% - 320px)}}.flood-warning-container .fw-tag{font-weight:600;line-height:1.5;letter-spacing:.8px;color:rgba(42,42,42,.72);padding-bottom:10px}.flood-warning-container .fw-icon{display:inline-block;max-width:95px;margin-top:4px}@media only screen and (max-width: 719px){.flood-warning-container .fw-icon{max-width:60px}}.flood-warning-container .fw-subheader{font-size:16px;line-height:20px;color:#2a2a2a}.flood-warning-container .fw-type{overflow-wrap:break-word;hyphens:auto}@media only screen and (min-width: 960px){.flood-warning-container .fw-type{padding-top:4px}}.flood-warning-container .fw-title{vertical-align:top;display:inline-block;font-size:36px;font-weight:600;color:#333;max-width:160px;line-height:40px;margin-left:10px;word-spacing:150px}@media only screen and (max-width: 719px){.flood-warning-container .fw-title{font-size:24px;line-height:28px}}.flood-warning-container .fw-link-container{margin:23px 0}.flood-warning-container .fw-link-container a{display:block;line-height:32px}/*# sourceMappingURL=flood-warnings.css.map */
